events.name: Azure Serverless App Services and F# Meetup
events.description: Hello Everyone, Opening up RSVP so that you can register. Agenda: 7:00 PM - 7:45 PM Fun introduction to F# 4.0 by Eriawan Kusumawardhono (Indonesia MVP)Understanding F# in VIsual Studio 2015, current advances and F# ecosystem. Also we welcome participation on F# Foundation Eriawan Kusumawardhono is a software developer and Software Architect in Indonesia. He's focusing on functional programming languages including F#, and other paradigm such as C++, C#, VB.NET, Scala, Haskell. Currently he's a Microsoft MVP - Visual Studio, formerly Microsoft Visual F# MVP  8:00 PM - 8:45 PM Azure Serverless App Services Logic Apps by Punit Ganshani (Azure and .NET MVP, Singapore) Design powerful Business Workflows and deliver integration capabilities Functions by Faizal Mohamed (Azure MVP, Singapore)Process events with serverless code  Thank you and see you all on 18th July. Cheers,Organizers
events.location: Microsoft Operations Pte Ltd, 22CF12, Level 22, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore

events.name: Singapore MusicTech - July Meetup
events.description:
Venue: 9th Floor, PayPal office, Suntect Tower 5 Speakers: • Philip Diamond  Phil is the founder and CEO of Audasis. He is passionate about technology, saving the planet, and creativity. He studied business and strategy with a focus on people. As a PC gamer growing up, he has always been very conscious of user experience and interface; that got him thinking about the ways in which people and technology interface. • Aqilah Misuary Aqilah is an electronic musician, sound-designer and audio-visual artist. She writes about anything related to music technology, sound design and web audio. Graduated with a B.A in Music Technology from Lasalle College of the Arts, Aqilah also performs regionally as a musician and does live visuals for various local bands.  Agenda: • 6:45pm: Come, have some pizza and say hello to each other• 7:20pm: Overview of how noise reduction, discussing both passive and active methods - by Phil • 7:50pm: Synthesising Drum Sounds using the Web Audio API  - by Aqilah• 8:20pm: Some performances this time!  • Bipin will bring his Flute (He's an amazing flute player) • Bernice said she will bring her xylophone. 


Related Articles: • Audasis - (customizable noise cancelling headphones)  http://www.audasis.com/ • How noise canceling headphone works - http://electronics.howstuffworks.com/gadgets/audio-music/noise-canceling-headphone.htm • Synthesizing sounds with Web Audio - http://sonoport.github.io/synthesising-sounds-webaudio.html
events.location: PayPal, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985, Singapore

events.name: React meetup - Jul 2016
events.description:
Topics1) Alternative libraries for React, Chia Kang Jin, Spacebib2) Redux Libraries, Shermane Lee, Government Digital Services3) Thoughts on Redux for Real-time Gaming, Ng Guoyou, Government Digital Services4) React Native - The Good and Bad, Lim Jia Rong, Government Digital Services 





Wanna share at one of our meetups or request a topic? Just contact any of us below: • Sheng Hau (chaishenghau@gmail.com) • Wendy (sohwendy@gmail.com) • Raphael (raphaeltanyw@gmail.com) • Yun Long (chong.yunlong@gmail.com)

events.name: Lets talk about Project Management!
events.description: Lets get together over a drink and share some tips and experience in dealing with challenging projects. This meet up will be conducted in a relaxed atmosphere so chillax! Free snacks will be provided. Bumped into troubles in your projects? Feel free to toss in questions and let the group give some feedback to you. If you have one topic or two that you would like to talk about, dont hesitate to bring them up as well. The meet up will follow the lean coffee structure. Everybody can suggest a topic or two, and then vote on the topic that interest them. One person can vote twice and may use all their votes on one topic. Topics get the most votes will get the spot light and will be selected for the night. Limited seats only 20 available. Please take note that this meet up starts at 8.00 pm unlike all the previous meetups.
events.location: Kazbar , 25 Church Street #01-03 Capital Square 3 Singapore 049482
